pageProduct.name: Skin Republic Pedi Peel Max Intensive Exfoliating Treatment
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Advanced peeling formulation with high dose Alpha Hydroxy Acids removes hard skin, cracked heels and calluses after just 7 days. Plant Extracts help reduce foot odour and leave feet feeling fresh and dry.

Warnings

This product contains Alpha Hydroxy Acids (AHA) and Salicylic Acid and is not suitable for sensitive skin. Do not use on inflamed skin or open wounds. Do not use if you have sensitivity to any of the ingredients in the ingredient list. May remove nail polish. If irritation occurs discontinue use, wash feet immediately and consult a physician. AHA may increase your skin's sensitivity and particularly the possibility of sunburn. It is recommended that prior to exposure to the sun, users cover areas where AHAs have been applied with sunscreen, wear protective clothing and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterwards. Contact of the product with the skin must be of limited frequency and duration. This product may cause skin irritation and may increase sensitivity. All skin types are different, and you may have a specific allergic reaction. If concerned, test a small area of foot before use: place a coin sized amount of liquid from inside the bootie onto your foot. Store in a cool, dry place, in ventilated area.

Common Uses

Skin Republic is a scientifically formulated, dermatologist-tested range combining the latest advances in skin care with natural plant extracts. Concentrated nutrient rich ingredients nourish and hydrate, helping you maintain healthy looking glow skin. These foot booties and packaging are biodegradable. Containg a foot serum to remove calluses, cracked heels and rough, dry skin 7 days. The concentrated serum delivers essential nutrients to the skin, revitalising the appearance of the feet. Contains 2 booties for one application.

Ingredients

Water(Aqua), Alcohol Denat., Lactic Acid, Glycolic Acid, Propylene Glycol, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Butylene Glycol, PEG-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Arginine, Salicylic Acid, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Disodium EDTA, Illicium Verum (Anise) Fruit Extract, Pinus Densiflora Leaf Extract, Morus Alba Bark Extract, Menthol, Tannic Acid, Tocopheryl Acetate, Urea, Glycerin, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Ginkgo Biloba Leaf Extract, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Extract, Malpighia Punicifolia (Acerola) Fruit Extract, Olea Europaea (Olive) Leaf Extract, Portulaca Oleracea Extract, Prunus Persica (Peach) Leaf Extract, Rosa Centifolia Flower Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Extract, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Leaf Extract, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Chamaecyparis Obtusa Leaf Extract, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Extract, Octyldodecanol, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Ceramide NP, Fragrance(Parfum).

Directions

DIRECTIONS 1. Cleanse and dry feet. 2. Remove booties from packaging. Cut open below the seal line on each bootie. 3. Make sure to open inner fabric bootie and place feet inside. 4. Wear for 90 - 120 minutes. For best results wear for 120 minutes (DO NOT exceed 120 minutes). 5. Remove booties. IMPORTANT: Wash feet thoroughly. 6. Dead skin will naturally peel off after 7-10 days. Do not physically pull or tear off skin during the peeling process. The skin will peel off naturally. 7. To be used only once every 6 weeks. Individual results may vary. 8. For best results on extremely rough, callused heels, help remove dead skin with a foot file. 9. Use immediately after opening and for one application only.
